content.text:
# Art Directors Guild Awards 2022

The 27th Art Directors Guild Excellence in Production Design Awards, honoring the best production designers in film, television and media of 2022, was held on February 18, 2023, at the InterContinental Hotel in Los Angeles, California. The nominations were announced on January 9, 2023. Yvette Nicole Brown hosted the ceremony for the second consecutive year.
Winners and nominees
Film
{| class=wikitable style="width=100%"
|-
! style="width=50%"| Excellence in Production Design for a Contemporary Film
! style="width=50%"| Excellence in Production Design for a Period Film
|-
|valign="top"|

** Bardo, False Chronicle of a Handful of Truths – Eugenio Caballero
** Bullet Train – David Scheunemann
** Tár – Marco Bittner Rosser
** Top Gun: Maverick – Jeremy Hindle
|
* 'Babylon – Florencia Martin'
** All Quiet on the Western Front – Christian M. Goldbeck
** Elvis – Catherine Martin and Karen Murphy
** The Fabelmans – Rick Carter
** White Noise – Jess Gonchor
|-
! style="width=50%"| Excellence in Production Design for a Fantasy Film
! style="width=50%"| Excellence in Production Design for an Animated Film
|-
|valign="top"|

Cinematic Imagery Award
* Baz Luhrmann and Catherine Martin
Hall of Fame
* Natacha Rambova and Terence Marsh (posthumous)
Lifetime Achievement Award
* Lilly Kilvert
* Luis G. Hoyos
* Janet Kusnick
* Michael Denering
William Cameron Menzies Award
* Guillermo del Toro
